>>== MODE ==>>
citation
<<== MODE ==<<


>>===== CITATIONS =====>>
[
  [
    {
      "citationID": "CITATION-1",
      "citationItems": [
        {
          "id": "ITEM-1"
        }
      ],
      "properties": {
        "noteIndex": 1
      }
    },
    [],
    []
  ]
]
<<===== CITATIONS =====<<


>>== RESULT ==>>
>>[0] § 23 ¶ 6
<<== RESULT ==<<

>>===== CSL =====>>
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <citation>
    <layout>
       <group delimiter=" ">
         <label form="symbol" variable="locator"/>
         <number label-form="symbol" variable="locator"/>
       </group>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
<<===== CSL =====<<


>>===== INPUT =====>>
[
    {
        "id": "ITEM-1", 
        "title": "Hello",
        "section": "sec. 23 para. 6",
        "type": "bill"
    }
]
<<===== INPUT =====<<
